entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
